name: Captain Holt Quotes
description: A collection of Captain Holt's best quotes from Brooklyn Nine Nine, in memory of Andre Braugher 1962-2023.
author: Mello

quotes.quote: Every time someone steps up and says who they truly are. The world becomes a better, more interesting place.
quotes.author: Captain Holt

quotes.quote: Any smile that lasts longer than a second and a half is a con man's ruse.
quotes.author: Captain Holt

quotes.quote: Now I know why you refer to this as a Suicide Squad, Peralta, because I already want to kill myself.
quotes.author: Captain Holt

quotes.quote: He was a great partner. Smart, loyal, homophobic, but not racist. In those days that was pretty good.
quotes.author: Captain Holt

quotes.quote: Why is no one having a good time? I specifically requested it.
quotes.author: Captain Holt

quotes.quote: Captain Wuntch. Good to see you. But if you're here, who's guarding Hades?
quotes.author: Captain Holt

quotes.quote: Any French philosophy post-Rousseau is essentially a magazine. You rube.
quotes.author: Captain Holt

quotes.quote: Why would you ever intentionally spill beans? They're one of nature's most densely packed protein sources, and they remain unsullied by flavor.
quotes.author: Captain Holt

quotes.quote: She's serving my favorite dessert: carrots.
quotes.author: Captain Holt

quotes.quote: Wuntchtime is over. Boom! Did it. Had it both ways. No regrets.
quotes.author: Captain Holt

quotes.quote: She sings in English. That's rock music.
quotes.author: Captain Holt

quotes.quote: Ouch. He ran over my foot. I am in incredible pain.
quotes.author: Captain Holt
